attributes.action: Full Disclosure Of Extra-Terrestrial Existence & Interaction With Our Country
attributes.background: Aliens have been working alongside the US. UK, and other world governments since at least 1947, when the infamous Roswell UFO crash happened in New Mexico, concealing advanced technology that could prosper this planet no end. Many governments world wide have aknowledged ET life. Why doesn't the UK??

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you'd like to make a request for information under the Freedom of Information Act, you can find out how to do that here:

https://www.gov.uk/contact/foi
